content: the everblooms hat is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern worked top-down in one piece this design uses half_double_crochet double_crochet and single_crochet stitches available in sizes preemie to adult with a matching scarf pattern **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our hat of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until february 24 > 2025 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on february 24th and it > will show as $0 00 **the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on february 23 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 ** you can find the matching scarf pattern here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/everblooms-scarf-beginner-pattern/ this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
